alert.note: Alert for Guam (Guam) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 3:00PM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...Tornadoes and waterspouts remain possible... At 145 PM ChST, the public reported a funnel cloud, possible tornado near Sana Rita. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Any portion of Guam could experience this, with slightly higher potential near and south of Cross Island Road. LANDSPOUT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Conditions are favorable for the development of weak, brief funnel clouds. This type of funnel cloud is harmless, but on rare occasions they can briefly touch down, producing wind gusts over 50 mph. If a funnel cloud is spotted move indoors and report your sighting to the National Weather Service. We are also monitoring social media as well. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Tiyan Guam.
